result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jose R Alvarez-Santillan

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Attorney Margaret Drees appeared for the State.  Attorney Terry l. Constant appeared on behalf of Defendant Jose R Alvarez-Santillan who does not appear.  Clerk: PT
Atty Constant has no explanation for DE's non appearance.  Court authorizes a Bench Warrant with a $3000 Cash Bond and prior bond is forfeited.

Attorney Margaret Drees appeared for the State. Attorney Terry l. Constant appeared on behalf of defendant who does not appear.  Clerk: PT
Atty Constant has no explanation for DE's non appearance but states case will be resolved with a plea on Monday.

Attorney Margaret Drees appeared for the State. Defendant, Jose R Alvarez-Santillan, appeared with Attorney Terry l. Constant.  Clerk: PT
Case is not resolved and scheduling order is given to parties.  Jury status hearing scheduled for October 29, 2015 at 01:00 pm.  Jury trial scheduled for November 2, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Final pre-trial at 09-04-2015 09:50 am confirmed with Atty Constant
Due to courts unavailability today; FPT rescheduled to 9/4/15 at 9:50 AM pending confirmation from Atty Constant

Attorney Margaret Drees appeared for the State. Defendant, Jose R Alvarez-Santillan, appeared with Attorney Terry L. Constant.  Clerk: PT
Atty Constant requests an adjournment as he still needs to speak with the DA.  FPT adj. to 7/21/15 at 10:20 AM.
No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.
Cash bond set at $500.00; refund excess. gb/cp   ck# 15CH

Not guilty plea entered by court on behalf of DE.  PTC on 5/29/15 @ 145pm.  FPT on 7/2/15 @ 930am.  $500  Cash Bond Set w/conditions (see bond entry).  Refund balance of $500
